alert.note: Alert for Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 12 at 3:25AM MST until December 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow with significant blowing and drifting snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Johnson County. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 PM Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible at times. Whiteout conditions are likely at times. Road closures are likely.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
